title: Garen takes alot of skill
body:
Necessary skills/knowledge required to play Garen:

1. Must have extensive knowledge about beyblades

2. Must know alot about bushes

3. Must have an base iq if 7

replies.body:
'Skill' was the key word right?
So what u actually need to do to 'Main' Garen is:

1. Never B, or else reported
2. Make sure you know how to farm, if not use your E
3. Watch Mulan, because you need to 'Be a Man' 1/4 of the time
4. Make sure when you see katarina you got 2 (this word actually cant be used due to many reasons, one being that 12ies may not know what it means)
5. IQ base of (complete lvl 1 of Fireboy and Watergirl)
6. Make sure to repeat this in your head: '_FOR DEMARCIA! FOR DEMARCIA! FOR FUKING DEMARCIA!_'
omg my IQ is too high, I think that's why I always end up making the enemy team

He actually required a little bit of timing if you want to play him in Gold+ matches well. Timing with when to Q, when to W, and when to use E.
Regardless, he's probably the easiest champion in League with like, zero skill floor.

> [{quoted}](name=ninjaIRL ,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=FR74sMJA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-15T10:32:30.746+0000)
>
> He actually required a little bit of timing if you want to play him in Gold+ matches well. Timing with when to Q, when to W, and when to use E.
> Regardless, he's probably the easiest champion in League with like, zero skill floor.

Cool downs are everything when you verse higher elo players.
If you waste an ability, they can abuse that and rekt you

Aatrox's Intensive Guide to Garen:

Step 1. Unlock Garen for free through Twitter.
Step 2. Profit.

misleading information 

garen needs plays iq of 10,
source: experience
